text: He kana lavuna khotya gosti aikanare ani mana trpta ho'iparyanta harama khanare aheta. Jara he tumacyajavala yetila tara tumhala adhikara ahe, vatalyasa tyancya daramyana phaisala kara, vatalyasa karu naka. Jara tumhi tyancyapasuna toda phiravunahi ghyala tarihi te tumhala kasalehi nukasana pohacavu sakata nahi ani jara tumhi phaisala karala tara tyancya daramyana n'yayasaha phaisala kara. Nihsansaya, n'yaya karanaryansi allaha prema rakhato
